title: Smart Data Models - SeriesCompensator
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A Series Compensator is a series capacitor or reactor or an AC transmission line without charging susceptance.  It is a two terminal device.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SeriesCompensator

r.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence resistance. Default: 0.0

r0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence resistance. Default: 0.0

varistorPresent.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describe if a metal oxide varistor (mov) for over voltage protection is configured at the series compensator. Default: False

varistorRatedCurrent.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The maximum current the varistor is designed to handle at specified duration. Default: 0.0

varistorVoltageThreshold.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The dc voltage at which the varistor start conducting. Default: 0.0

x.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence reactance. Default: 0.0

x0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence reactance. Default: 0.0
